text: [Music]
I became a musician because I couldn't
do anything else because um like I think
all musicians
um making music was the way that I make
sense with the
world I have no description for my
creative process I have no idea how it
works um except to just try and be
available and vulnerable
to what's happening with me in life and
just kind
of it has more to do just sort of
relaxing into it than anything else and
also I think create a creative process
happens when you're not in a state of
judgment about yourself you you're in
this kind of like um you're not editing
you're just kind of uh uh expressing
without
without any kind of recrimination which
is kind of hard to do since most artists
are um engaged in quite a bit of
self-hate myself
included I had a lot of um uh ups and
downs in my
whole pedagogy I
uh have some learning impediments I have
uh uh add and I have dyslexia
um and that made it very hard for me to
function in the institution of school so
I failed the first grade um but I also
managed to go to Cal Berkeley and I
studied English there and I think there
I learned two things from studying
literature one was
um I learned how to pay attention to
what I was thinking to what was
happening in my own mind uh and I also
learned how to edit to say this is this
is the cookie cutter of my thoughts
these are the things that fit in and
these are the things that don't I think
a lot of my education happened in the
music business itself we're now in a new
music music business that the the old
style of the major Label records is
uh is in the process of ending it's not
over yet and certainly um they are still
relevant but they are changing into
something else if they weren't changing
um a group like big think would not be
doing an interview with me we would
there wouldn't be anything to talk about
so what we're talking about is the
change I think my
education um says a student is just
about sort of being collegial with
people um and uh learning senses of
balance but I probably learned that as
much uh in in in the process of uh
having a uh a band with a record deal
and dealing with marketers and radio
promotions people and publicists Etc
